name: Simulate template matches overlapping legacy and composable templates

headers.warning: 299 Elasticsearch-8.18.0-a3623cdef1723c813790dfe87be966f35b8b6cf1 "index template [winning_v2_template] has index patterns [test*] matching patterns from existing older templates [v1_template] with patterns (v1_template => [test*, t1*]); this template [winning_v2_template] will take precedence during new index creation"
